xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 5 Saññojanagocchaka, Kusalattika » 5.2 Saññojaniyaduka, Kusalattika » 5.2.2 Abyākatapada » 5.2.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Saññojanagocchaka, Kusalattika
Saññojaniyaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
18.
1735Saññojaniyo abyākato dhammo saññojaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo…  purejātapaccayena paccayo…  pacchājātapaccayena paccayo…  āhārapaccayena paccayo…  indriyapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
19.
1736Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1737Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cattāri. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1738Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1739(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetuup5.3 Saññojanasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika >>
